subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Steve Oleksy, a 27-year-old defenseman making his playoff debut, had a perfect assist against the Rangers in Washington’s 3-1 victory in Game 1. He also took a slap shot in the face.
snippet: Steve Oleksy, a 27-year-old defenseman making his playoff debut, had a perfect assist against the Rangers in Washington’s 3-1 victory in Game 1. He also took a slap shot in the face.
